scripts.generate:local: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 HOST=https://local-api.spruce.ai graphql-codegen codegen.yml && prettier-eslint -l info --write "src/generated/api-gql.ts"
scripts.generate:dev: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 HOST=https://dev-api.spruce.ai graphql-codegen codegen.yml && prettier-eslint -l info --write "src/generated/api-gql.ts"
scripts.generate:qa: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 HOST=https://qa-api.spruce.ai graphql-codegen codegen.yml && prettier-eslint -l info --write "src/generated/api-gql.ts"
scripts.generate:prod: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 HOST=https://api.spruce.ai graphql-codegen codegen.yml && prettier-eslint -l info --write "src/generated/api-gql.ts"
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run clean && tsc | true && mkdir -p build/src/gql && cp -R src/gql/* build/src/gql
